alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Harrison; Taylor (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 9:31PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Taylor, northern Barbour and eastern Harrison Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 929 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Anmoore, or near Clarksburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clarksburg, Grafton, Philippi, Bridgeport, Shinnston, Stonewood, Nutter Fort, Lumberport, Anmoore, Enterprise, Lost Creek, Flemington, Valley Falls, Moatsville, Rosemont, Knottsville, Meadland, Tygart Lake State Park, Thornton and McGee. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 109 and 128. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 77 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
